strapiPost.title: Cypress Cold Storage Breaks Ground On New Facility In Springdale
strapiPost.content:
Cypress Cold Storage recently broke ground on a 207,285 sqft storage facility in Springdale, adding to the region's warehouse capacity for the food and beverage industry.

  • Crank up the AC: The facility will feature an insulated metal panel exterior, an 8,450 sqft office space, 21 dock positions, and 170,000 sqft of temperature-controlled space for frozen and refrigerated goods.
  • Cool jobs: Cyprus Cold Storage is expected to bring 50 new jobs to the region by the time the project is completed in Spring 2024, contributing to Northwest Arkansas's reputation as a distribution and transportation industry leader.

Read more about the project HERE.
